Origin: 異形の化け物を撃破せよ！
敗北条件：煉󠄁獄杏寿郎の戦闘不能

Name: #REF!
Origin: 仲間には手出しさせん！

Name: #REF!
Origin: You will not touch my comrades!
幽世の軍勢の進行を食い止めろ！
敗北条件：いずれかのキャラの戦闘不能

Name: #REF!
Origin:
強力な気配を感じます……！
気を付けてください！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I can feel it... A powerful attack's coming! Be careful!

Name: #REF!
Origin: ここは任せろ。

Name: #REF!
Origin: Leave the rest to me.

Name: #REF!
Origin:
お、おい！　まだ出てくるぜ……！
この状況……どうすりゃいいんだ！？
Korean:
어,어이! 계속 튀어나오는데..?!
이 상황.. 어떻게 해야하는거야..?!

Name: #REF!
Origin: Wh-what the! They just keep spawnin'! How are we supposed to end this nightmare?
Korean:
어,어이! 계속 튀어나오는데..?!
이 상황.. 어떻게 해야하는거야..?!

Name: #REF!
Origin: っ、大丈夫か！？

Name: #REF!
Origin: Are you okay!

Name: #REF!
Origin: ちょっと私に見せて下さい。

Name: #REF!
Origin: Hold still now.

Name: #REF!
Origin:
凄いです！あれだけの傷が
一瞬で治っちゃいました……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: What? All those injuries just vanished in an instant!

Name: #REF!
Origin: 私は薬学に精通しているんです。

Name: #REF!
Origin: I know a thing or two about medicine.

Name: #REF!
Origin: 気を抜くな、まだ来るぞ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: On your guard! This battle is not over!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
かく……り……よ……
まも……らね…ば……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Defend... the... Other... world!

Name: #REF!
Origin: 冨岡は援護を頼む！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Tomioka, we need your help!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ここを凌ぎきり、
一気に終わらせるぞ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: If we can hold out against this next attack, this battle is ours!

Name: #REF!
Origin: 援護する！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I am with you, Nezha!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ふふん！　アタシの魔眼を
お見舞いしてあげたわ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Hah! Gave 'em a taste of my petrifying glare!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
今がチャンスよ！
やっちゃいなさい！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Now's your chance! Finish this!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
幽世の門って言うから
ビクビクしていたけど、
結構いけそうだな！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Man, I got kinda scared 'cause we're fightin' the Otherworld Gate and all, but this is easier than slicin' through pie!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
…………
（すごく嫌な匂いがする……）

Name: #REF!
Origin: ... (I smell danger...)

Name: #REF!
Origin: 妙な術を食らったか……。

Name: #REF!
Origin: What strange art is this...

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ヤベェぞ！ ここは回復に
専念した方がいいんじゃねぇか？

Name: #REF!
Origin: Uh-oh! We'd better patch ourselves up—and fast!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
落ち着け、呼吸を整えろ……！
俺は、挫けない……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Calm down... Steady your breathing... I won't let things end here!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
刃を障壁のようなもので
弾いているようだな。
Korean:
칼날을 장벽같은 것으로
튕겨내고 있는 것 같군.

Name: #REF!
Origin: It seems your blades are being deflected by some kind of barrier.
Korean:
칼날을 장벽같은 것으로
튕겨내고 있는 것 같군.

Name: #REF!
Origin:
はっはー！　面白ぇ！
お前等、伊之助様に続けー！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Haha! Things are getting interesting! Minions, after me!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
す、すげぇ……。
障壁を破っちまったぜ……。

Name: #REF!
Origin: What the... He just barreled through that force field like it was made of cardboard.

Name: #REF!
Origin: ワハハハハ！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Muahahaha!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
おい！　気味悪ぃのが
広がってくぞ！？

Name: #REF!
Origin: Hey! The sticky's spreading again!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ああぁぁぁどうしよう……
どうしよう炭治郎ぅぅぅ……

Name: #REF!
Origin: Waah... What do we do... What do we do... Tanjirooo...

Name: #REF!
Origin:
…… いや、大丈夫だ。
みんなで戦えば、必ず勝てる！
Korean:
.... 아냐, 괜찮아.
모두와 함께 싸우면, 반드시 이길 수 있어!

Name: #REF!
Origin: We'll be fine. As long as we work together, there's nothing that can stop us!
Korean:
.... 아냐, 괜찮아.
모두와 함께 싸우면, 반드시 이길 수 있어!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
もっと、呼吸を
研ぎ澄ませるんだ……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I have to focus my breathing more!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
良く踏みとどまった！
竈門少年達！

Name: #REF!
Origin: You did well to hold out this long, Kamado!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
敵の術が解けましたね。
でも、まだ終わりじゃないようです。
Korean:
적의 기술이 풀렸네요.
하지만, 아직 끝나지는 않은 것 같네요.

Name: #REF!
Origin: Yes, its magic's faded. But it seems the fight still isn't over.
Korean:
적의 기술이 풀렸네요.
하지만, 아직 끝나지는 않은 것 같네요.

Name: #REF!
Origin:
正念場だ！　呼吸を意識しろ！
ここで終わらせるぞ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Draw deep breaths and concentrate! This next blow will decide the battle!

Name: #REF!
Origin: 一気に片を付けましょう。

Name: #REF!
Origin: We'll eradicate them all at once.

Name: #REF!
Origin:
オイラ達も最後までみんなと
力を合わせて戦うぜ！
Korean:
우리들도 마지막까지 모두와 함께
힘을 합쳐 싸우겠어!

Name: #REF!
Origin: We're with you to the very end!
Korean:
우리들도 마지막까지 모두와 함께
힘을 합쳐 싸우겠어!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
呼吸を研ぎ澄ませろ……！
ここで必ず倒すんだ……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Come on... Focus your breathing! It's now or never!
